item.title: Kris add a quote by Beth Moore
item.description: "Instead, I get to know that a greater yes is in progress, and I can count on the bigger miracle." -- Beth Moore

item.title: Kris add a quote by Beth Moore
item.description: "What reason did God give Joshua for turning from fear and discouragement in the face of huge opposition? “The LORD your God will be with you wherever you go” (Josh. 1:9). When Jesus told His disciples not to be afraid in the storm, the reason wasn’t the removal of their frightful circumstances but the presence of their Savior. “Take courage! It is I. Don’t be afraid” (Matt. 14:27)." -- Beth Moore
